price: (14) Does He who created not know,[1716] while He is the Subtle, the Aware?
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
footnotes: [1716]- Another accepted meaning is "Does He not know those whom He created...?"

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
